task.name: The Zen of Python
task.description: Beautiful is better than ugly. Explicit is better than implicit. Simple is better than complex. Complex is better than complicated. Flat is better than nested. Sparse is better than dense.

task1.name: Flask Web Development
task1.description: Flask is a small framework by most standards—small enough to be called a “micro-framework,” and small enough that once you become familiar with it, you will likely be able to read and understand all of its source code.

task2.name: How to Flatten a List of Lists in Python
task2.description: Sometimes, when you’re working with data, you may have the data as a list of nested lists. A common operation is to flatten this data into a one-dimensional list in Python. Flattening a list involves converting a multidimensional list, such as a matrix, into a one-dimensional list.
